fullText: Mary-Louise Parker gives a performance of extraordinary subtlety and power as a creative writing professor who forms an intense bond with a brilliant but troubled student.
dtliExcerpt: Mary-Louise Parker gives a performance of extraordinary subtlety and power as a creative writing professor who forms an intense bond with a brilliant but troubled student.
